ygData.subject: Re: New :)
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a gal in the bank in Grobb who just doesn t like me unless I do Alliance.  Not sure why, but she dropped me once or twice. I ve never killed any
ygData.messageBody:
There is a gal in the bank in Grobb who just doesn't
like me unless I do Alliance. Not sure why, but she
dropped me once or twice. I've never killed any
trollies up to that point, and couldn't figure it out.
I wrote it off to religion =)


--- Hadow@... wrote:
> I am an Erudite Enchantress who is NOT agnostic and
> I have no problems walking about any of the evil
> cities under the appropriate guise. I also shop or
> use the bank in them whenever needed. Is there
> someone or some specific shop that any of you go to
> which results in the shopkeeps seeing through your
> illusions?
>
> Zealott
>
<HR>
<html>
>
